name: Karma
title: the Enlightened One

P.name: Gathering Fire

effects.description: Innate: Karma reduces Mantra's cooldown by 2 / 3.5 / 5 (based on level) seconds for each enemy champion she damages with an ability, or by 1 second whenever she uses her basic attacks on-hit against them.

P.notes:
Inner Flame /  Soulflare reduces  Mantra's cooldown per target hit (for a total of 10 / 17.5 / 25 (based on level) seconds if 5 enemy champions are hit at once).
 Focused Resolve /  Renewal reduces  Mantra's cooldown per tick (for a total of 4 / 7 / 10 (based on level) seconds for the entire duration).
 Inspire /  Defiance does not reduce  Mantra's cooldown (it has no damage component).
P.blurb: Reduces Mantra's cooldown each time Karma damages an enemy champion with one of her abilities (Half-effect for Karma's basic attacks)

Q.name: Inner Flame

effects.description: Active: Karma fires a burst of spiritual energy in the target direction that detonates on the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage to all enemies within the area and slowing them by 35% for 1.5 seconds.

Q.notes:
Spell shield will block the initial impact from Inner Flame.
Inner Flame will cast from wherever Karma is at the end of the cast time.
Q.blurb: Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit.

Q.name: Soulflare

effects.description: Mantra - Active: Inner Flame detonates upon hitting an enemy or reaching maximum range, dealing bonus magic damage in an increased area.
A field lingers around the detonation for 1.5 seconds, slowing enemies within by 50%, after which it explodes, dealing magic damage to all enemies within the area.

Q.notes:
Spell shield will block the initial impact from either ability but will not block Soulflare's field damage.
The lingering field will place under the impacted enemy, rather than the impact point.
Soulflare will cast from wherever Karma is at the end of the cast time.
Q.blurb: Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.

W.name: Focused Resolve

effects.description: Active: Karma exerts her will over the target enemy champion or monster, dealing them magic damage and forming a tether between Karma and the target for 2 seconds, during which the target is revealed.
If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, the target is dealt the same magic damage again and is revealed and rooted for a duration.

W.notes: Spell shield will block the tether's application and damage but not the aftereffects of one already applied.
W.blurb: Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted and damaged again.

W.name: Renewal

effects.description: Mantra - Active: Focused Resolve's root duration is increased, and heals Karma for 20% (+ 1% per 100 AP) of her missing health on-cast and once more when the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, or if the target dies while tethered.

W.notes: Spell shield will block the tether's application and damage but not the aftereffects of one already applied.
W.blurb: Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration.

E.name: Inspire

effects.description: Active: Karma shields the target allied champion or herself for 2.5 seconds and grants the target bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds.

E.blurb: Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Movement Speed of the protected ally.

E.name: Defiance

effects.description: Mantra - Active: Inspire's target receives bonus shield and all allied champions near them receive 30% of the total shield's amount.

E.blurb: Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions.

R.name: Mantra

effects.description: Active: Karma empowers her next basic ability within 8 seconds for an additional effect.
Karma begins the game with one rank in Mantra.
Mantra can be used while affected by crowd control.

R.notes:
Mantra counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as Spellblade and stacking  Force Pulse.
Mantra's bonus effects are added on top of Karma's basic abilities.
R.blurb: Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 and does not require a skill point.

lore: No mortal exemplifies the spiritual traditions of Ionia more than Karma. She is the living embodiment of an ancient soul reincarnated countless times, carrying all her accumulated memories into each new life, and blessed with power that few can comprehend. She has done her best to guide her people in recent times of crisis, though she knows that peace and harmony may come only at a considerable cost—both to her, and to the land she holds most dear.

skins.name: Original
skins.lore: No mortal exemplifies the spiritual traditions of Ionia more than Karma. She is the living embodiment of an ancient soul reincarnated countless times, carrying all her accumulated memories into each new life, and blessed with power that few can comprehend. She has done her best to guide her people in recent times of crisis, though she knows that peace and harmony may come only at a considerable cost—both to her, and to the land she holds most dear.

skins.name: Sun Goddess
skins.lore: An ageless being in whom the sun rises and sets, Karma is the key to an ancient prophecy spelling doom for the world. When she is overtaken by the moon, four titans will rise up from the depths of the earth, annihilating all life.

skins.name: Traditional
skins.lore: Created to capture the original feel of Karma, one of our first fully reworked champions.

skins.name: Warden
skins.lore: The Protectorate was an order dedicated to enforcing a rigid, unforgiving system of laws, in an attempt to slow the seemingly inevitable rise of the Magelords. Though the order itself was disbanded long ago, Wardens such as Karma still uphold its tenets… and guard its many secrets.

skins.name: Winter Wonder
skins.lore: A powerful sorceress at one with the natural world, Karma spreads snow like a soft blanket across the enchanted forests of the Winterlands. A loyal friend of the Poro King—wherever Karma goes, winter follows.

skins.name: Conqueror

descriptions.description: Loot exclusive gained during the 2019 MSI Event.

skins.lore: Commemorating the 2017 Mid-Season Invitational in Brazil.

skins.name: Dark Star

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

skins.lore: Karma was a galaxy-spanning civilization dedicated to pacifism and personal enlightenment, unceremoniously erased from reality and reborn as a star-consuming horror. Devouring entire galactic systems, she enforces a dread order upon the cosmos, meditating in the vast oceans of emptiness where once there were stars.

skins.name: Dawnbringer

descriptions.description: This chroma was acquired during the 2019 Night & Dawn event. All proceeds went to charity.
This chroma was acquired during the 2019 Night & Dawn event. All proceeds went to charity.
This chroma was acquired during the 2019 Night & Dawn event. All proceeds went to charity.
This chroma was acquired during the 2019 Night & Dawn event. All proceeds went to charity.
This chroma was acquired during the 2019 Night & Dawn event. All proceeds went to charity.
This chroma was acquired during the 2019 Night & Dawn event. All proceeds went to charity.

skins.lore: Charged with governing the cosmic cycles of death and rebirth, Karma fights to protect the wellspring of souls as they journey to reincarnation. More so than the other cosmic beings, she cares for the mortal souls she shepherds, striving to create a more structured world.

skins.name: Odyssey

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Worlds event.
This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.lore: A High Priestess of the Templar Order, Karma has hired a group of offworld mercenaries to free a number of captured templars from the grip of Aatrox, an infamous and powerful crime lord. She has taken a more interventionist stance towards the rest of the universe following the loss and transformation of her former lover, Zed.

skins.name: Ruined

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

skins.lore: Surviving the initial ruination of Ionia, Karma is ultimately lost during a second one led by Viego himself. With the Spirit of Ionia itself removed from the continent, the Ionian people must band together to save one another, even as Karma twists the souls of millions to a new, horrific purpose.
